com.culturemesh.android

Class FindNetworkActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentPagerAdapter
      • com.culturemesh.android.FindNetworkActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter
  • Enclosing class:
    FindNetworkActivity

    public class FindNetworkActivity.SectionsPagerAdapter
extends FragmentPagerAdapter
    A FragmentPagerAdapter that returns a fragment corresponding to one of the two available tabs: From, for location-based networks, and Speaks, for language-based networks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SectionsPagerAdapter(FragmentManager fm)

      Always returns 2 because there are 2 tabs

    • Method Detail

      • getItem

        public Fragment getItem(int position)
        Get the appropriate fragment depending on which tab is selected
        Parameters:
        position - Either 0, for near or 1, for speaks
        Returns:
        FindNetworkActivity.FindLocationFragment for position=1, FindNetworkActivity.FindLanguageFragment otherwise.

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Always returns 2 because there are 2 tabs
        Returns:
        Always 2

      • getPageTitle

        public java.lang.CharSequence getPageTitle(int position)
        Get the titles for each tab
        Parameters:
        position - Position of tab to get name of (0 or 1)
        Returns:
        Reference to name of tab
